name: spomky-labs/jose
description: JSON Object Signing and Encryption library for PHP.

suggest.lib-openssl: Required to use AES algorithms (except AES GCM)
suggest.ext-gmp: Required if BCMath is not installed (this extension is highly recommended!)
suggest.ext-bcmath: Required if GMP is not installed
suggest.ext-crypto: Required to use AES GCM algorithms
suggest.phpseclib/phpseclib: Required to use RSA based algorithms
suggest.mdanter/ecc: Required to use Elliptic Curves based algorithms
suggest.spomky-labs/aes-key-wrap: Required to use Key Wrap (A128KW, PBES2-HS256+A128KW...) algorithms
